EmailTemplate.name: northam-event-ecs-workshop-santa-monica-q217.2017Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Workshop Santa Monica | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Workshop in Santa Monica on April 11th. {{my.Cloud-Native Santa Monica:default=edit me}}
This is a reminder that registration and breakfast will be held at Pivotal Labs Santa Monica <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal/@34.0156579,-118.4995675,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cff20dd34b:0x3059d35494015052!8m2!3d34.0156579!4d-118.4973788]]> at 8:45AM, moving to ROC Santa Monica <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4945013,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjNhPnkjJPTAhXK3YMKHYZYCycQ_BIIdzAK]]> at 10:00AM.
Date: Tuesday, April 11, 2017
Time:
8:45AM to 10:00AM
Location: Pivotal Labs Santa Monica 1333 2nd Street Santa Monica, CA, 90401 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal/@34.0156579,-118.4973788,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3059d35494015052!8m2!3d34.0156579!4d-118.4973788]]>)
Time:
10:00AM to 2:15PM
Location: ROC Santa Monica 604 Arizona Avenue Santa Monica, CA, 90401 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0194011,-118.4966953,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x80c2a4cec2c92a97:0x3d06ccbca95fb3b6!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]>)
The closest Public Parking Lot <[[https://www.parkme.com/lot/41526/public-parking-4-santa-monica-ca]]> is located at 1321 2nd St. Technical prerequisites for the workshop are listed below. See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop-santa-monica.html]]> Technical Prerequisites For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending by following the steps below:
- Sign-up for a free account at http://run.pivotal.io <[[http://run.pivotal.io]]>. - Install the Cloud Foundry CLI at https://console.run.pivotal.io/tools <[[https://console.run.pivotal.io/tools]]>.
If you have any questions related to the workshop, please contact ceisner@pivotal.io <[[mailto:ceisner@pivotal.io]]>.
Kind regards, The Pivotal Team
